channel.title: string-literal on Ballerina Coding Tips
channel.description: Recent content in string-literal on Ballerina Coding Tips

item.title: String Literal
item.description: You can write a string literal, by wrapping the Unicode code points using two double quotes ".

item.title: String Escape Chars
item.description: There are certain code points, that are not allowed inside a string literal. You can use String Escape or Numeric Escape syntaxes to provide such code points.
